content: the pattern includes instructions for all three costumes of hello kitty butterfly ladybug and bee the description does not include learning materials for understanding of the description you need to have basic crochet skills difficulty level - low average materials and tools - yarn «yarnart jeans» - № 03 milk for kitty additional colors differ depending on outfit you choose in this pattern crocheting is demonstrated on the example of butterfly outfit choose one main color and one/several additional colors for the costume for the butterfly outfit - № 89 light purple - № 72 lilac for the ladybug outfit - № 26 red - № 53 black for the bee outfit № 35 yellow № 70 chocolate № 88 light yellow oval half-beads in black color for eyes 8*10 mm and yellow for nose 6*8 mm / pieces of felt of the same colors and sizes or sewing thread for embroidering eyes and nose - crochet markers - fiberfill hollow fiber - crochet hook № 2 - floss thread color black for face embroidery - sewing pins - thick needle for assembly sewing needle - scissors - piece of wire to strengthen the antennae
